content: Before you can take command of your colony, you need to install AntMe! on your computer. That means you need to install the game itself as well as a few extra bits that help it run (what programmers call "dependencies"). So you will also need to download and install a development environment, which is what you will use to write and edit the code itself. And you will need a couple of frameworks, which are sort of like building blocks that programmers use.
Once you have gotten acquainted with the game you can start programming your ants. The tutorial lessons are a great place to begin.
